page.title: 03LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: These are Gribbin Headland,Lankelly Cliffs and St Catherine's Point.The walk passes cliffs,small coves and beaches to the Gribbin Headland where there is a tall beacon. {Gribbin Head-History ____________________ St. Catherine's Castle was originally built in 1540 and other parts added in 1855.There were old iron swivels for the cannons to turn on.In the castle all that remains are eight windows,a chimney and the top half of a stone staircase with a number of walls. Then you would come to the Allday's Fields which were presented to the people of Fowey by G.James Allday Esq. 28th March, 1951 for recreational purposes.
